-- Noir --

Noir reaches the cargo hold in a short time. The sliding door opens 
quickly, and she steps inside. As she begins her search, she is soon 
joined by Torin who was right behind her.

"Communicator beacons... Might as well start by checking the opened 
sotrage boxes." She says, heading over to a large box, about half 
her size.

When she looks into it, she finds it moderately full of odds and 
ends... some broken computer parts, a few weapons... and a few 
communicator beacons.

"Found two..." She says, and keeps looking after throwing them into 
an empty container she'd grabbed as they'd come in.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "Right." Torin scoots after her.
> 
> ------
> 
> Meanwhile, Gatara is soon out of the ship and airborne, her 
cloaking 
> device masking what would otherwise have been a drop-dead-obvious 
> target.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > -- Noir --
> > 
> > Noir gives Devilcat a curt nod, "Yes Sir." She saluts quietly, 
and 
> > then looks over at Torin.
> > 
> > "C'mon Torin, lets go." She leaves the control room, and heads 
for 
> > the cargo hold.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > Riekan displays emotion for once: sadistic glee.  "So much for 
the 
> > > Forgotten Autobots," he sneers, watching the fireball of 
> > Vindicator's 
> > > demise slowly fade away.
> > > 
> > > "Now I can get back to my original train of thought," Devilcat 
> > says.  
> > > "Noir, you and Torin are going to dig out all the communicator 
> > beacons 
> > > you can find in the cargo hold.  I want them converted to 
jamming 
> > > stations.  Gatara, go check on the crash site; make sure our 
foes 
> > are 
> > > properly disposed of.  Riekan, keep working on the engine 
> > repairs.  If 
> > > any of you see Jayde, tell her I want to speak with her.  I'll 
be 
> > > keeping an eye on things here."
> > > 
> > > Gatara and Riekan move off to their assigned tasks ...
